content.para: The 3.9.3 release fixes the following issues.

tr.td: Add customerId parameter to the eTools document source.

td.p: Folks willing to use the "web" document source, kindly provided by Comcepta AG should contact Comcepta for a private customer key (otherwise the number of queries per IP is limited and may result in IP-blocking).

tr.td: Sonatype repository references moved from http to https.

td.p: POM now refers to https location for SonaType's release repositories.
FoamTree visualization has been updated to the new shiny version, which is faster and supports super-large hierarchies (although clustering will typically produce much more shallow results).

tr.td: Per-algorithm lexical resources in the DCS.

td.p: The DCS now supports per-algorithm resource lookup locations, which in turn allows configuring the same algorithm with different stop words, etc.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
